# Agentic AI: Key Insights

*Generated by WCC Tech Scout | October 26, 2024*

## Overview
Agentic AI refers to AI systems capable of autonomous planning, reasoning, and acting to achieve goals. This is a step beyond simple chatbots, enabling AI to use tools, make decisions, and complete complex tasks.

## Key Findings
*   Agentic AI systems can autonomously plan, reason, and take actions.
*   Major tech companies like Google, OpenAI, and Anthropic are investing heavily in this area.
*   Key trends include multi-agent orchestration, tool use, memory management, Agent-to-Agent protocols (A2A), and Model Context Protocol (MCP).

## Resources
*   Google AI Blog: What is Agentic AI? (Dec 2024)
*   TechCrunch: The Rise of AI Agents (Nov 2024)
